metadata.description:
This playbook gets triggered every hour and perform the following actions:
 1. Get all the threat intelligence indicators from Microsoft Sentinel Workspace with given tag.
 2. Filter all the indicators whose export in not completed.
 3. Share the STIX Bundle, that includes the 'Indicator, corresponding Identities, Markings and optional Sighting' with the to provided TAXII server.
postDeployment: This playbook needs contributor role on Log Analytics, to read and update threat indicator tags. 1. Go to Log Analytics Workspace resource --> 2. Select Access control (IAM) tab -->3. Add role assignments --> 4. Select Contributor role --> 5. In the Members tab choose 'Assign access to' Managed Identity --> 6. Click on 'Select members' --> 7. Provide correct Subscription and Managed Identity  --> 8. Provide the playbook name in 'Search by name' textbox --> 9. Select the correct identity and click on Select --> 10. Click on 'Review + assign'
prerequisites: 1. Have the provided TAXII Server Url, Collection ID, your Organization Name, Organization UUID derived from STIX Identity and API Key available before the deployment of the Playbook

2. Tag the indicators that need to be exported, by default this playbook exports the indicators with tag 'NDN Share', this can be changes during the deployment of playbook. Details on how to tag can be found [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/understand-threat-intelligence#view-and-manage-your-threat-indicators)
3. Tagged indicators that are shared successfully get the tag 'NDN Sharing Complete', by default include a sighting object.
metadata.title: NCSCNLShareSTIXBundle

metadata.description: Enter value for Collection ID, which is the TAXII Collection ID.
Enter value for Organization Name, which is derived from your registered STIX Identity.
Enter value for Organization UUID, which is derived from your registered STIX Identity.
Enter value for Default TLP Label, which is used when no TLP is assigned.
Enter value to include Sighting Object, which is used to share a Sighting on a particular existing Indicator.
Enter value for the PlaybookName, which is used to create the actual underlying LogicApp.
Enter value for Tag for indicator export completion, which is used by the playbook to record completion.
Enter value for Tag for indicators to be exported, which is used by the playbook to include for sharing.
Enter value for TAXIIServer ApiKey, which is used by the playbook to communicate with the TAXII API.
Enter value for TAXIIServer Password, which should be left default for compatibility purposes.
Enter value for TAXIIServer RootURL, which is provided by NCSC-NL as valid TAXII Endpoint.
Enter value for TAXIIServer Username, which should be left default for compatibility purposes.
Enter value for Workspace, which is your actually implemented Log Analytics Workspace Name used by Microsoft Sentinel.

Set_variable_with_STIX_bundle_JSON.description: Union of Indicators to remove duplicate TLP MarkingRefObjs

inputs.where: @contains(item()?['properties']?['threatIntelligenceTags'], parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported'))

Add_description_to_GroupingObjs_Array.description: descirption later to be used in Grouping

Append_IndicatorExtId_to_array_GroupingO.description: Store IndicatorExtID, later to be used for Grouping

Append_confidence_score_to_array_Groupin.description: confidence score later to be used in Grouping

Append_IncidentTag_to_array_GroupingObjs.description: Store IncidentID, later to be used for Grouping

Append_'NoIncident'_to_array_GroupingObj.description: Append 'NoIncident' if IncidentID is not present

inputs.where: @not(equals(parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported'), item()))

Append_MarkingRefObjID_to_array_AllMarki.description: This array is used in Identity Object creation.

Append_MarkingRefObjID_to_array_Grouping.description: Store MarkingRefObjID, later to be used for Grouping

body.keywords: tags:"@{parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported')}"

Initialize_array_IncidentIDLabelsForGrou.description: Array stores all the combinations of IndicatorId, IncidentId and MarkingRefObj as ';' concatenated string

Initialize_array_TempIncidentIdArray.description: Array to store IncidentId which grouping is created
